lead_paragraph: Animal rights groups and primate sanctuaries are fighting a plan to send eight chimpanzees living at a research laboratory in Atlanta to a wildlife park in Kent, England.

headline.print_headline: Second Lawsuit Is Filed to Block Moving Chimps From U.S. to England
headline.main: 2nd Lawsuit Filed in U.S. to Block Chimps’ Move to England

snippet: Animal rights groups and primate sanctuaries are fighting a plan to send eight chimpanzees living at a research laboratory in Atlanta to a wildlife park in Kent, England.
abstract: Animal welfare groups and primate sanctuaries file lawsuit to counter plan by United States Fish and Wildlife Service to transfer eight chimpanzees from laboratory at Yerkes National Primate Research Center, at Emory University in Atlanta, to wildlife park in England; suit claims move to park would not further survival of species, as required by Endangered Species Act; filing marks second attempt to block transfer.
